# Globals.Range&lt;T&gt; method

Computes the range of a sequence numbers. The range is the spread of the elements from the lowest to the highest value

```csharp
public static T Range<T>(params T[] items)
    where T : INumber<T>
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Type |
| items | A sequence of numbers |

## Return Value

the range of a sequence numbers
